Name: inquiry-detail-editor
Label: Inquiry Detail Editor

Components.Label: BookingALL
Create Pricing
Components.Query:
select PricingDetail.*
from PricingDetail
left join Pricing on PricingDetail.PricingId = Pricing.Id
where PolId = '{PolId}' and PodId = '{PodId}'
and FromDate <= '{EtdDate}' and ToDate >= '{EtdDate}'
and CommodityId = '{CommodityId}'
and (({ServiceId} in (1,2) and TypeId = 2) or ({ServiceId} not in (1,2) and TypeId = 1))
and Pricing.Id in (select top 1 Pricing.Id
from PricingDetail
left join Pricing on PricingDetail.PricingId = Pricing.Id
where PolId = '{PolId}' and PodId = '{PodId}'
and FromDate <= '{EtdDate}' and ToDate >= '{EtdDate}'
and CommodityId = '{CommodityId}'
and TypeId = 1)

Components.Label: Approve
Components.Query:
select ds.*,ctr.Name as UnitName,fee.GroupName as GroupFee,isnull(ds.VendorId,Pricing.VendorId) as ActVendorId
from PricingDetail ds
left join Pricing on ds.PricingId = Pricing.Id
left join MasterData ctr on ds.UnitId = ctr.Id 
left join FeeType fee on ds.DescriptionId = fee.Id 
where ds.PricingId = '{PricingId}' 
and DescriptionId is not null 
and (('{IsLCL}' = '1' and (ctr.Name like N'%LCL%' or ctr.Name like N'%ALL%')) or ('{IsLCL}' = '0'))
and (('{IsFCL}' = '1' and ctr.Name not like N'%LCL%') or ('{IsFCL}' = '0'))

Components.Label: Group

POD
POL
Components.Query: {    "sql": "select * from [Terminal] as ds",    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from [Terminal] as ds"}

and CommodityId = '{CommodityId}'

left join FeeType fee on ds.DescriptionId = fee.Id 
where ds.PricingId = '{PricingId}'
